casebody.data:
Frederick Zimmerman, Respondent v. The Broadway and Seventh Avenue Railroad Company, Appellant. Decided January 11, 1892. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered on verdict of jury in the plaintiffs favor and from an order denying motion for a new trial. Root & Clarke, for appellant. Earned & Warren, for respondent.

Before Freedman, P. J., McAdam and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Freedman, P J.; McAdam and Gildersleeve, JJ., concurred.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
